properties.entry: UPDATE document SET sign_type = ?, subject = ?, message = ?, complete_date = ? WHERE id = ?

INSERT INTO document_sign_field (signer_id, document_id, page_number, priority, position_left, position_top, height, width, field_value, field_name, field_type,created_date) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?)
INSERT INTO document_sign_email (signer_id, document_id, priority, status) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?)

SELECT doc.id AS docId, doc.envelopeid AS envelopeId, doc.sign_type AS signType, doc.name AS documentName, doc.subject AS subject, doc.message AS message, cl.email AS signerEmail, isnull(cl.firstname,'')+ ' '+isnull(cl.lastname,'') AS requestedBy, CONVERT(VARCHAR(10), isnull(doc.complete_date,''), 101) + ' ' + LTRIM(RIGHT(CONVERT(CHAR(20), isnull(doc.complete_date,''), 22), 11)) AS completedDate, 'Completed Document' AS status FROM document AS doc INNER JOIN users AS cl ON cl.id = doc.user_id WHERE doc.status = 1 AND cl.id = ? ORDER BY doc.id DESC

SELECT cl.email AS signerEmailId, signEmail.status AS signerStatus, cl.name AS signerName, signEmail.priority AS priority, signEmail.sent_email_count AS emailCount FROM document AS doc INNER JOIN document_sign_email AS signEmail ON signEmail.document_id = doc.id INNER JOIN signer AS cl ON cl.id = signEmail.signer_id WHERE doc.status = 1 AND doc.id = ?

SELECT doc.id AS docId, doc.envelopeid AS envelopeId, doc.name AS documentName, doc.sign_type AS signType, doc.subject AS subject, doc.message AS message, cl.email AS requestedEmail, isnull(cl.firstname,'')+ ' '+isnull(cl.lastname,'') AS requestedBy, CONVERT(VARCHAR(10), isnull(doc.upload_date,''), 101) + ' ' + LTRIM(RIGHT(CONVERT(CHAR(20), isnull(doc.upload_date,''), 22), 11)) AS uploadDate, 'Out For Signature' AS status FROM document AS doc INNER JOIN users AS cl ON cl.id = doc.user_id WHERE doc.status = 0 AND cl.id = ? AND doc.subject is not null AND doc.message is not null AND doc.digital IS NULL ORDER BY doc.id DESC

SELECT cl.email AS signerEmailId, signEmail.status AS signerStatus, cl.name AS signerName, signEmail.priority AS priority, signEmail.sent_email_count AS emailCount FROM document AS doc INNER JOIN document_sign_email AS signEmail ON signEmail.document_id = doc.id INNER JOIN signer AS cl ON cl.id = signEmail.signer_id WHERE doc.status = 0 AND doc.id = ?
SELECT * FROM document WHERE id = ?
SELECT TOP 1 status FROM client WHERE id = ? AND email = ? AND password = ?
SELECT id FROM tb_client_user WHERE email = ?
INSERT INTO tb_client_user (client_id, email, password, token, status, date) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?)
SELECT TOP 1 status FROM client WHERE id = ? AND email = ? AND password = ?
SELECT TOP 1 status FROM client WHERE id = ? AND email = ? AND password = ?
SELECT id FROM tb_client_user WHERE id = ? AND id = ? AND client_id = ?
INSERT INTO documents_fields (document_id, form_field_type, pageno, x_position, y_position, height, width, form_field_name) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?)
INSERT INTO tb_signing_details (client_id, originator_id, signer_id, document_id, signing_order, token, status, created_on, updated_on) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?)
INSERT INTO tb_document_details (client_id, user_id, document_name, document_original_name, status, created_on, updated_on) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?)
SELECT TOP 1 * FROM tb_client_user WHERE id = ?

SELECT f.id, f.form_field_name, f.form_field_type, f.pageno, f.y_position, f.x_position, f.height, f.width FROM tb_document_details AS doc INNER JOIN documents_fields AS f ON doc.id = f.document_id WHERE document_name = ?
UPDATE documents_fields SET form_field_value = ? WHERE id = ?
SELECT tsd.id FROM tb_document_details tdd JOIN tb_signing_details tsd ON tdd.id = tsd.document_id WHERE tdd.document_name = ? AND tsd.status = ?

SELECT tsd.id, tdd.document_name, tcu1.email AS originator, tcu2.email AS signer, tsd.token FROM tb_signing_details tsd JOIN tb_client_user tcu1 ON tcu1.id = tsd.originator_id JOIN tb_client_user tcu2 ON tcu2.id = tsd.signer_id JOIN tb_document_details tdd ON tdd.id = tsd.document_id WHERE tsd.id = ?
UPDATE tb_signing_details SET status = 1 WHERE id = ?

SELECT tsd.id FROM tb_signing_details tsd JOIN tb_client_user tcu1 ON tcu1.id = tsd.originator_id JOIN tb_client_user tcu2 ON tcu2.id = tsd.signer_id JOIN tb_document_details tdd ON tdd.id = tsd.document_id WHERE tdd.document_name = ? AND tcu1.email = ? AND tcu2.email = ? AND tsd.token = ? AND tsd.status = ?
SELECT original, digital FROM document WHERE envelopeid = ?
INSERT INTO document (user_id, envelopeid, name, original, status, file_type, subject, message, sign_type, upload_date,client_ip_address) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?)

SELECT id, firstname, lastname, photo, email, phone, country, state, pincode, password, company_name, job_title, client_id, client_secret, email_verification_token, user_type, status, role, is_company, created_on, updated_on, project_name, theme, drysignlink, deviceversion FROM users WHERE email = ?
SELECT TOP 1 id FROM signer WHERE email = ?
INSERT INTO signer (name, email, user_type, status, created_on) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?)

INSERT INTO document_sign_field (signer_id, document_id, page_number, priority, position_left, position_top, height, width, field_value, field_name, field_type, created_date) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?)
INSERT INTO document_sign_email (signer_id, document_id, priority, sent_email_count, token, status, created_date) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?)
SELECT id FROM document WHERE envelopeid = ?
SELECT TOP 1 d.id FROM document d JOIN users u ON u.id = d.user_id WHERE u.email = ? AND d.envelopeid = ? AND d.status = 0
delete dse FROM document d LEFT JOIN document_sign_email dse ON d.id = dse.document_id LEFT JOIN document_sign_field dsf ON d.id = dsf.document_id WHERE d.envelopeid = ?
INSERT INTO users (firstname, lastname, email, password, email_verification_token, user_type, status, role, created_on) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?)

INSERT INTO users (firstname, lastname, email, phone, country, state, pincode, company_name, client_secret, password, email_verification_token, user_type, status, role, created_on, project_name) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?)
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM users WHERE email = ?
SELECT TOP 1 id FROM users WHERE email = ? AND email_verification_token = ? AND status = 0
UPDATE users SET status = 1 WHERE id = ?
INSERT INTO token_details (user_id, token, status, valid_from, valid_to) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?)

SELECT id, firstname, lastname, photo, email, phone, country, state, pincode, password, company_name, job_title, client_id, client_secret, email_verification_token, user_type, status, role, is_company, created_on, updated_on FROM users WHERE email = ?
SELECT tdd.id FROM tb_document_details tdd JOIN tb_signing_details tsd ON tdd.id = tsd.document_id WHERE tdd.document_name = ? AND tsd.status = ?

SELECT id, firstname, lastname, photo, email, phone, country, state, pincode, password, company_name, job_title, client_id, client_secret, email_verification_token, user_type, status, role, is_company, created_on, updated_on FROM users WHERE email = ?
INSERT INTO document (user_id, envelopeid, name, original, status, file_type, sign_type,upload_date,client_ip_address) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?)
SELECT * FROM document WHERE id = ? AND name = ?
UPDATE document SET subject = ?, message = ? WHERE id = ?
SELECT TOP 1 id FROM signer WHERE email = ?
INSERT INTO signer (name, email, user_type, status, created_on) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?)

INSERT INTO document_sign_field (signer_id, document_id, page_number, priority, position_left, position_top, height, width, field_value, field_name, field_type, created_date) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?)
INSERT INTO document_sign_email (signer_id, document_id, priority, sent_email_count, token, status, created_date) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?)
SELECT dse.token FROM document_sign_email dse JOIN signer c ON c.id = dse.signer_id WHERE dse.document_id = ? AND c.email = ?
SELECT dsf.* FROM document_sign_field dsf JOIN signer c ON dsf.signer_id = c.id WHERE c.email = ? AND dsf.document_id = ?
SELECT COUNT(dse.document_id) FROM document_sign_email dse JOIN signer c ON dse.signer_id = c.id WHERE c.email = ? AND dse.document_id = ? AND dse.token = ? AND dse.status = 0
SELECT dse.priority FROM document_sign_email dse INNER JOIN signer c ON c.id = dse.signer_id WHERE c.email = ? AND dse.document_id = ? AND dse.token = ? AND dse.status = ?
UPDATE document_sign_email SET status = ? WHERE token = ?
SELECT c.email FROM users c INNER JOIN document d ON d.user_id = c.id WHERE d.id = ?
SELECT c.email FROM signer c INNER JOIN document_sign_email dse ON dse.signer_id = c.id AND dse.document_id = ? AND dse.priority = ?
SELECT subject, message FROM document WHERE id = ?
UPDATE document_sign_field SET field_value = ? WHERE id = ?
UPDATE document SET electronic = ?, complete_date = GETDATE() WHERE id = ?
UPDATE document SET status = 1, digital = ?, complete_date = GETDATE() WHERE id = ?

SELECT id, firstname, lastname, photo, email, phone, country, state, pincode, password, company_name, job_title, client_id, client_secret, email_verification_token, user_type, status, role, is_company, created_on, updated_on FROM users WHERE email = ?
SELECT id, name, email, user_type, status, created_on, updated_on FROM signer WHERE email = ?
DELETE FROM document WHERE id = ?
SELECT id FROM users WHERE email = ?
UPDATE users SET password = ? WHERE id = ?
UPDATE users SET photo = ? WHERE id = ?
SELECT id FROM users WHERE email = ?
INSERT INTO user_forgot_password (user_id, token, status, date) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?)
UPDATE c SET c.password = ?, c.status = 1 FROM users c JOIN user_forgot_password ufp ON c.id = ufp.user_id WHERE ufp.user_id = ? AND ufp.token = ? AND ufp.status = 0
UPDATE ufp SET ufp.status = 1 FROM users c JOIN user_forgot_password ufp ON c.id = ufp.user_id WHERE ufp.user_id = ? AND ufp.token = ? AND ufp.status = 0

SELECT SUM(CASE WHEN electronic IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS total, SUM(CASE WHEN status = 1 AND digital IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS complete, SUM(CASE WHEN status = 0 AND electronic IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS incomplete FROM document WHERE user_id = ?
UPDATE users SET firstname = ?, lastname = ?, phone = ?, country = ?, state = ?, pincode = ? WHERE id = ?
SELECT TOP 1 id, name FROM document WHERE envelopeId = ?
DELETE FROM signature WHERE id = ?
select id from signature where user_id = ? and signature_data like ?
INSERT INTO signature (user_id, signature_data, created_date) VALUES (?, ?, ?)
UPDATE users SET photo = NULL WHERE id = ?

UPDATE dse SET dse.sent_email_count = ? FROM document_sign_email dse INNER JOIN signer s ON dse.signer_id = s.id
WHERE dse.document_id = ? AND s.email = ?
select id from user_forgot_password where user_id = ? and token = ? and status = 0

SELECT d.name as name, d.status as status, d.client_ip_address as client_ip_address, d.upload_date as upload_date FROM document d JOIN users u ON d.user_id = u.id WHERE u.email = ? AND d.envelopeid = ?
insert into audit(userid,ip_address,web_request,web_response,status,method_name,created_on) values(?,?,?,?,?,?,?)
